mutants.code:
def invert_words(string):
    words = string.split('')
    inverted_words = []
    for word in words:
        inverted_word = word[::-1]
        inverted_words.append(inverted_word)
    inverted_string = ' '.join(inverted_words)
    return inverted_string

def invert_words(string):
    words = string.split(' ')
    inverted_words = []
    for word in words:
        inverted_word = word[::--1]
        inverted_words.append(inverted_word)
    inverted_string = ' '.join(inverted_words)
    return inverted_string
